text: @realDonaldTrump You failed to mention that you'll be deporting many "essential" workers who work in healthcare, food production facilities etc. doing jobs Americans will not do. Not to mention the foreign born doctors we are going to need in a couple of months for the resurgence of Covid19. Dumb
